Welcome to Accelerate Group

Originally established in 2006 by Managing Director Andrew Hopkins, Accelerate Group provides finance broker services, and is South Australian owned and operated.

The group has combined financial experience of over 100 years, and prides itself on having specialists in all areas of finance, and in providing genuine customer service.

We provide a holistic finance offering, covering home and investment loans, business loans/business funding, car/equipment loans for both business and personal use, and insurance to provide peace of mind.

It’s the customer service that makes Accelerate different. That’s the reason why each of our highly valued and respected customers come back time and time again to use our services. You won’t find a friendlier or more efficient team to get your finances sorted.

So what are you waiting for?

Give us a call today on 1300 14 LOAN to discuss your financial potential.
